reviewText: ... and get everyone like it that you can (all of three sets only). If you are the lover of David Suchet's Poirot, as I am, this dvd collection is the one to start off with - accept no others.An annoying habit of the market is to put out a "dvd collection" that is a few paltry episodes or bits of a series. Later ... WHAM!! ... the whole series or a newly configured set comes out, and you're angrier than a monkey with its tail burned off.This dvd set is not like that. It is packed with episodes, among them the elusive "Chocolate Box", one of my most favorite Poirot adventures of all. Sadly, at present only two other of these boxed sets are available:"Agatha Christie's Poirot: The Classic Collection" - Set 1, Set 2, Set 3 and alas, no more - plus, each set is sold separately. Try not to go out on a limb with other collections unless you know them well, or unless the collection contains a film you particularly love, as this set contains one I particularly love.These sets are not the only collections that have the original hour-long A&E; Channel Poirot series, and there are other sets containing the two-hour specials. Not to mention the collection of the newer films from circa 1999 to 2010 (I have yet to see DEATH ON THE NILE which was promised back in 2010, but has never been shown on TV; I have enjoyed EVIL UNDER THE SUN which was as dark as can be, vid. my review).So be very careful choosing sets - though this particular set is in a silver box, one clue to help you besides using the full, correct titles of these sets is that they come in metallic, brightly-hued boxes. Set 1 is copper/dark orange, Set 2 is gold/yellow and Set 3 is, as you see, silver/grey. (If they ever do a Set 4 my guess is the box will be platinum/white.)Best thing to do here at Amazon is enter the FULL TITLE as shown on box and in this review - use the color as a guide also, but select these sets carefully.There is a very fine (but even more paltry) collection of Suchet-Poirot films, but it very nearly copies these Sets in its trade dress. Not a bad set - it is the "Movie Collection" as opposed to this Set of "Classic Collection" - but it's NOT THIS SET. You'd be disappointed if you are an original series fan and want to start collecting the original A&E; hour-long series. This other set consists of the 2-hour movie classics, and believe me, they are as confusing and horrifying as the open sea - to those who do not know how to navigate!One thing is certain: at this price and with this set which I think totals over 1,500 minutes of pure Poirot pleasure, you'll feel tres bien ... et tres jolie! A good organized set and good bargain, when you consider the not-so-complete DVD set retails around $250 or so ....
summary: Le bon Dieu this is the set to get, Set 3 of 3, quelle honte!
Title: Agatha Christie's Poirot: The Classic Collection - Set 3

reviewerName: Mattie Gibson "an oldie but a goodie"
reviewText: Hi,I have a question not a comment, one thing I hate is that I can not tell the titles of the films in the collection. I love Poirot, and have many of the volumes, I am just missing eight, I ordered some collection also, but I am so afraid of ordering movies that I already have. So if someone who already owns this collection count put the titles of the movies in the classic collection, I would really appreciate it.Thanks
Title: Agatha Christie's Poirot: The Classic Collection - Set 3

reviewText: Of course, we are great "Poirot" fans and who wouldn't be! David Suchet's performance of HP is such fun. This particular DVD has my personal favorite with the "Chocolate Box" amd the "Yellow Iris".  Enjoy!!
Title: Agatha Christie's Poirot: The Classic Collection - Set 3

reviewText: If a person likes high class and very well written mysteries, like Agatha Christie's books coming alive, then this is one series a person should invest in.  David Suchet does a wonderful and sometimes very funny Poirot, who is always in control and consumate detective.  The stories are intelligent, riveting, and interesting.  I highly recommend anything Agatha Christie starring David Suchet.
summary: Agatha Christie's Poirot:  The complete series
Title: Agatha Christie's Poirot: The Classic Collection - Set 3

reviewText: Great viewing mysteries with Poirot that will keep you viewing and reviewing for hours.  The complete collection of this series is great and has great viewing mysteries.
Title: Agatha Christie's Poirot: The Classic Collection - Set 3
